chinese: 上周,我4岁的女儿Sally被邀请去参加一个儿童聚会.
english: Last week, my four-year-old daughter, Sally, was invited to a children's party.
I decided to take her by train.

chinese: 萨莉非常激动,因为她以前从未乘过火车.
english: Sally was very excited because she had never travelled on a train before.

chinese: 她靠车窗坐着,对她所看到的一切都要问个明白.
english: She sat near the window and asked questions about everything she saw.

chinese: 突然,一个中年妇女上了火车,坐在Sally的对面.
english: Suddenly, a middle-aged lady got on the train and sat opposite Sally.

chinese: Sally没回答,却好奇地看着她.
english: Sally did not answer, but looked at her curiously.

chinese: 那位妇女穿着一件蓝色的大衣,戴着一顶大而滑稽的帽子.
english: The lady was dressed in a blue coat and a large, funny hat.
After the train had left the station,

chinese: 那位妇女找开了手提包,拿出了她的粉盒.
english: the lady opened her handbag and took out her powder compact.
She then began to make up her face.
Why are you doing that?' Sally asked.

chinese: “为了把自己打扮漂亮啊,”那位妇女答道.
english: To make myself beautiful,' the lady answered.

chinese: 她收起来她的粉盒,慈祥地微笑着.
english: She put away her compact and smiled kindly.

chinese: “可是你仍然很难看呀,”萨莉说.
english: But you are still ugly,' Sally said.

chinese: Sally感到很有趣,而我却很尴尬.
english: Sally was amused, but I was very embarrassed!
